data.name: Project Existence - Multiplayer Sandbox
data.detailed_description:
STAY TUNED FOR UPDATES


About the Game

Step into the evolving world of Project Existence, a sandbox MMO prototype in active development that lets players test and try out new features and game mechanics. Project Existence is Arctic Theory’s canvas used for design exploration and world building of our upcoming MMO game, all while inviting players to take part in the development process.

A sandbox, multiplayer canvas


The world of Project Existence is constantly changing and evolving. Features and mechanics are implemented depending on what the team wants to focus on next. Creating a massively multiplayer game takes time and effort, and Project Existence is our way to try out new ideas and technology in a live environment.

What to expect?


When you step into Existence (pun intended) you’re greeted with a massive world filled with snow and empty space. The features currently implemented is resource gathering from trees and rocks, and in the coming months we will be introducing a mission based system where you can put those resources to use.

If you’re expecting a game with hours of gameplay, you’re going to be really disappointed. If you’re interested in trying out mechanics as they are being developed, talking to developers and providing feedback, you’re in for a treat!

Since we’re treating Project Existence as our very own personal development sandbox, features we have previously implemented are still subject to change, or even removed completely. Everything we do in this prototype, is laying the groundwork for our future title.

By playing Project Existence, you might experience:
  • Bugs, occasional broken features and sometimes confusing UI
  • Satisfaction when features finally start working properly (maybe)
  • Contemplation of life, and what you’re doing here in the first place

So join in on the fun!

To stay updated on what we’re working on and what we have planned for Project Existence, join us on Discord where we actively engage with the community, answer questions and gather feedback!

data.short_description: Project Existence is a not-so-serious sandbox multiplayer prototype in active development. Players take part in the process, with different features and mechanics being implemented frequently to try and test out. Be a part of the world and watch as it evolves!
data.reviews:
“eximst yeth”
5/5 – Some guy on Steam

“I have no idea what this game is, there's no context or explanation for anything.”
5/5 – Another guy on Steam

“Help?!?!?!”
7/10 – Someone on Discord

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i5-3570 3.4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card, GeForce 2080
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game is in early access and system requirements may change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: TBD
  • Graphics: TBD
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
